Posts.Content: Thanks so much for the reply, I truly appreciate your time. I’ve had 1 appt with plastic surgeon and 2 appts with GP who have now referred me for mammogram and investigations on Thursday. A week away feels like forever! X
Posts.Title: 25 years old with dent and puckering

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for responding, I appreciate your comments. Yes there is no history of any breast cancers as far as I’m aware, which I suppose is a positive. I have a referral for the hospital breast clinic on Thursday. Hoping the week does not drag X
Posts.Title: 25 years old with dent and puckering

Posts.Content: Hello all. I have an appointment with my breast clinic on a Thursday but I’ve noticed a change with the dent in my right breast tonight that has me even more panicked. I’ll start by saying I have breast implants too, which makes this even more confusing as I keep switching between wondering whether the implant is acting up, or if it’s something sinister. I have a large dent under my nipple that is huge and clearly visible when I lean back. It’s also more apparent when I move my arm, and palpable to touch at all times. I have been to my plastic surgeon who has said the implant is intact, well positioned, and with no capsular contraction. I now have puckering skin along the line of the dent. Has anyone’s BC ever started like this? My mum had leukaemia 4 years ago, my brother testicular Cancer last year and I just don’t think my family can deal with another blow! If anyone has any similar stories? Thanks, Luce x
Posts.Title: 25 years old with dent and puckering

Posts.Content: Yes, trying to avoid reading much aside from similar examples! I’ll definately update here X
